pullRequest.title: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Since we are adding the pull-based segment ingestion pipeline, it would be better to rename the term PUSH to LOAD in newly added batch ingestion configs.
Changes are made only under BatchIngestionConfig.
segmentPushType -> segmentIngestionType
SegmentPushFrequency -> segmentIngestionFrequency

nodes.bodyText: Alternative suggest" segmentIngestionFrequency and segmentIngestionType, since "load" has the connotation of a segment being loaded in memory. Especially with the recent proposal for a segment to be in "deep store" vs "loaded"

commit.message: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency

beforeCommit.message: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentLoadType and segmentLoadFrequency

afterCommit.message: Rename segmentPushType and SegmentPushFrequency to segmentIngestionType and segmentIngestionFrequency
